column1: Tourist arrivals to Sri Lanka during the year 2020 amounted to 507,704 registering a
decline of 73.5 % since 2019. The unprecedented health crisis caused by the COVID
19 pandemic caused a heavy blow to the industry bringing the industry to almost to a
halt.  Reported number of nights spent in 2020 by international tourists was 4,315,484
